nodes.text: Viktor Hel was a famous Corellian bounty hunter living during the Galactic Civil War. He piloted a green Kihraxz assault fighter as his personal starship and owned Hel's Outfitting, a small store in Winterdome on the planet Corfai.

Viktor Hel first appeared in an introductory short story in the Fantasy Flight Games sourcebook No Disintegrations for their Edge of the Empire roleplaying game. Though his image in the book is not explicitly labeled, the artist, Joel Hustak confirmed the identity in an Instagram post.
